app_PyQt5 module

app_PyQt5.addCourse()[source]

Adds a new course to the database.

Retrieves course information from input fields and inserts a new record into the Courses table in the database. updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.addInstructor()[source]

Adds a new instructor to the database.

Retrieves instructor information from input fields and inserts a new record into the instructor table in the database. updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.addStudent()[source]

Adds a new student to the database.

Retrieves student information from input fields and inserts a new record into the Students table in the database. updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables. displays an error popup in case of errors or bad inputs

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.assignInstructor()[source]

Obtains a course ID and InstructorID from input fields, and sets the value of the instructorID for this course to the obtained instructor id. displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.changeInstructor()[source]

Obtains a course ID and InstructorID from input fields, and sets the value of the instructorID for this course to the obtained instructor id. displays an error popup in case of error

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.default_populate_tables()[source]

populates the tables in the View Tables tab with all available entries (no filters)

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.deleteCourse()[source]

Deletes a course from the database.

Retrieves the course ID from the input field and deletes the corresponding record from the courses table in the database. updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.deleteInstructor()[source]

Deletes a instructor from the database.

Retrieves the instructor ID from the input field and deletes the corresponding record from the instructors table in the database. updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.deleteStudent()[source]

Deletes a student from the database.

Retrieves the student ID from the input field and deletes the corresponding record from the Students table in the database. updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.dropStudent()[source]

Obtains a studentID and a courseID from input fields and deletes the row in Registrations table which corresponds to both values. shows an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.editCourse()[source]

Edit the course whose ID is retrieved from the input field by replacing one or more of its attributes in the database with the corresponding values in the nonempty input field. if an input field is left empty, the corresponding value is unchanged updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.editInstructor()[source]

Edit the instructor whose ID is retrieved from the input field by replacing one or more of its attributes in the database with the corresponding values in the nonempty input field. if an input field is left empty, the corresponding value is unchanged updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.editStudent()[source]

Edit the student whose ID is retrieved from the input field by replacing one or more of its attributes in the database with the corresponding values in the nonempty input field. if an input field is left empty, the corresponding value is unchanged updates the info in the tables by calling default_populate_tables displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.exportCourses()[source]

exports all database entries in the courses table into a json file named courses.json. Creates this file if it doesn’t exist Overwrites it if it exists

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.exportInstructors()[source]

exports all database entries in the instructors table into a json file named instructors.json. Creates this file if it doesn’t exist Overwrites it if it exists

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.exportRegistrations()[source]

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.exportStudents()[source]

exports all database entries in the students table into a json file named students.json. Creates this file if it doesn’t exist Overwrites it if it exists

Nothing.

app_PyQt5.file_not_found_popup()[source]

Displays an error message in a pop-up window, stating that the file was not found

Returns:

nothing

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.filter_results()[source]

Obtains filter values from the input fields, and obtains data from the database according to these filters. Clears the tables, then populates them with the filtered results

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.generate_csv()[source]

generates a csv file containing all records in the tables in the database by exporting them to json first, then using these json files to populate the csv file.

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.loadCourses()[source]

inserts all entries in the courses.json file into the Courses table in the database displays a file not found error in case this file doesn’t exist display an error popup in case of errors in inserting data into the database

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.loadInstructors()[source]

inserts all entries in the instructors.json file into the Instructors table in the database displays a file not found error in case this file doesn’t exist display an error popup in case of errors in inserting data into the database

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.loadRegistrations()[source]

inserts all entries in the registrations.json file into the Registrations table in the database displays a file not found error in case this file doesn’t exist display an error popup in case of errors in inserting data into the database

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.loadStudents()[source]

inserts all entries in the students.json file into the Students table in the database displays a file not found error in case this file doesn’t exist display an error popup in case of errors in inserting data into the database

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.main()[source]

Main function to start the School Management System application.

This function creates the main window of the application with tabs for Students, Instructors, Courses, Registrations, and viewing and exporting the data. It initializes the GUI and connects the functions to the UI elements.

Raises:

SystemExit – If the application exits unexpectedly.

Returns:

nothing

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.populate_table(table, data)[source]

populates the given table in the View Tables tab with the given data, after clearing it from existing data

Parameters:

  • table (QTableWidget) – The table object to populate

  • data (list of 4-tuples or 3-tuples) – the data to populate the table with

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

app_PyQt5.registerStudent()[source]

Obtains a studentID and a courseID from input fields and inserts a record in the Registrations table, indicating that this student has registered in this course displays an error popup in case of errors

Returns:

Nothing.

Return type:

None

Displays an error message in a pop-up window.

nothing
